text: Godɨn gumazamizir Babilonɨn itiba, God me ko ia mɨsevezɨ, me ia bagha akam amaga ghaze, Afeziam ia ko ikɨ.5:13a Babilon arazir kurabagh amir nguibam. Ezɨ Pita Romɨn itir dughiam, Rom tintinimɨn arazir kurabar Godɨn gumazamizibagh ami, mati Babilon fomɨra me gamizir arazim mokɨn. Kamaghɨn Pita akar isɨn zuimɨn Rom dɨbora ghaze, Babilon. Nan otarim Mak, a uaghan ia bagha akam amaga ghaze, Afeziam ia ko ikɨ.5:13b Mak guizɨn Polɨn otarim puvatɨ. A gumazir ighiar an akurvagha an gɨn aruim.
